name: Musings of big data scientist...
body:
# Musing of a Big Data Scientist
After trying out Medium and LinkedIn to publish articles, this is my latest experiment. I couldn't find a good way to publish my code based, Markdown written articles on those sites. So, here we are!

The first set of articles are on feature engineering. The first [post](#) starts with extracting features from a simple date time column.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
